p: Measurement data were expressed as mean ± standard deviation or median with interquartile range. Enumeration data were expressed as percentages and rates. T-tests and non-parametric tests were used to compare continuous data. Chi-square tests were used to compare counts. The level of significance was set at 0.05. SPSS 20.0 was used to analyse the data. All figures were created with Microsoft PowerPoint 2016.
